Job Title: Product Manager

Location: Wauwatosa, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Product Management, Strategy/Planning

Description:
C2 client, a thriving global software company that believes that ecommerce software should enable sustainable growth and their two ecommerce applications exemplify that belief. They seek a Product Manager to focus on the development of product planning processes for client ecommerce products. Your objective will be to conduct an in-depth analysis of the market needs, customer needs, market trends, and competitor offerings to identify opportunities for product enhancement and differentiation.
Our client is building something special. Awesome ecommerce software and a great place for team members to bring their whole selves to work. Their people are passionate about the work and enjoy cracking jokes along the way. The teams tackle complex challenges and work together to create innovative solutions, celebrating every little victory along the way. They're committed to helping team members grow their career while joining an organization that values cultivating a feeling like a family.
Start date: As soon as they find the right personDuration: Full-time Direct HireLocation: Hybrid in Wauwatosa, WI with Tues./Thurs. in officeCompensation: Commensurate with experience
Product Information:
The company developed two software products, an ecommerce product customization platform that allows shoppers to personalize, customize, and configure products as well as an enterprise, B2B ecommerce platform with a rich set of built-in features to easily manage content, site search, product information, and multi-store functionality.
Job Summary:
In this role, you will lead the product planning processes for a vertical market, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and growth. Additionally, you will develop and execute product strategies, from conception to launch, for vertical markets ensuring alignment with company goals and customer satisfaction.
Responsibilities:
Drive the entire product lifecycle for a particular vertical, including market research, competitor analysis, roadmap development, technology partnerships, and product launchTranslate product strategy into detailed requirements, guiding engineering teams through prototyping and final development stagesCreate comprehensive product strategy documents outlining business cases and business requirementsCollaborate closely with engineering, marketing, and sales teams to ensure successful product development, QA, release, and communication/trainingCollaborate with marketing to create product positioning and messaging that highlights company unique value proposition in the vertical markets
Requirements:
5+ years of proven experience in software product management, with a track record of successfully leading cross-functional teamsExceptional analytical skills and the ability to translate market insights into actionable product strategiesStrong communication skills, including writing, editing, and presentation abilitiesBachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in product design, engineering, or related field
Nice-to-haves:
Previous experience in ecommerce product managementExperience in a Business Analyst roleDemonstrated success in product development in a non-managerial roleTechnical background is a plus
Not your type of gig, but know someone who would be interested? Refer a qualified candidate, and if they get the job, you get a signing bonus! (Make sure they mention your name as their referral source so you get your well-deserved credit!)
All candidates must be located and authorized to work in the United States. C2 does not sponsor work visas. No C2C.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
